thread.section_title: Hotel Banke - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful Hotel, Excellent Place to Stay
thread.title_full: Wonderful Hotel, Excellent Place to Stay - Review of Hotel Banke, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Amanda K
title: Wonderful Hotel, Excellent Place to Stay
text: We stayed at the Hotel Banke at the beginning of March and were pleasantly surprised with how large our room was and how attentive the staff were (particularly Fahad and Marian). The hotel is in a wonderful location that is close to many sites (whether by walking or a short uber ride) and reception was more than helpful with providing any recommendations or suggestions of places to eat/visit. The decor was chic, clean, and modern. Would definitely stay again!
